description.raw:
In a3907ff, the default ogre package on recent distros was changed from `libogre1.8-dev` to `libogre1.9-dev`. Since support for ogre 1.9 was only recently added in gazebo5, this change caused some trusty builds to fail for the gazebo 3.x and 4.x branches:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/450/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/451/

I have proposed a fix here that will try to detect the gazebo major version and choose an ogre package accordingly. Here is a gazebo_3.1 build using this release-tools branch:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-gazebo_3.1-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/28/

UPDATE: the build succeeded.
